verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> And Rehoboam שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> to Shechem כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שְׁכֶ֛ם <WH7927> to Shechem בָּ֥א <WH935> were come כָל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> for all Israel לְהַמְלִ֥יךְ <WH4427> to make him king אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ ׀ <WH8085> heard יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> And it came to pass when Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֗ט <WH5028> of Nebat וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was yet בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> who was yet in Egypt אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where בָּרַ֔ח <WH1272> [of it] (for he was fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from the presence הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> Solomon וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> That they sent וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> and called ל֔וֹ [וַיָּבֹאוּ כ] (וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> abide ק) יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> him And Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <WH1696> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> unto Rehoboam לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> Thy father הִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH7185> grievous אֶת־ <WH853> עֻלֵּ֑נוּ <WH5923> our yoke וְאַתָּ֡ה <WH859> you עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now הָקֵל֩ <WH7043> upon us lighter מֵעֲבֹדַ֨ת <WH5656> service אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> of thy father הַקָּשָׁ֗ה <WH7186> now therefore make thou the grievous וּמֵעֻלּ֧וֹ <WH5923> yoke הַכָּבֵ֛ד <WH3515> and his heavy אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> which he put עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> on וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5647> and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to לְכ֥וּ <WH1980> Depart עֹ֛ד <WH5750> again שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> yet [for] three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> then come again אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> departed הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> to me And the people

וַיִּוָּעַ֞ץ <WH3289> consulted הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam אֶת־ <WH854> with הַזְּקֵנִים֙ <WH2205> with the old men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> had עֹמְדִ֗ים <WH5975> that stood אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Solomon אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father בִּֽהְיֹת֥וֹ <WH1961> had חַ֖י <WH2416> while he yet lived לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> and said אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <WH3289> How do ye advise לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> that I may אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> answer

[וַיְדַבֵּר כ] (וַיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> spoke ק) אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying אִם־ <WH518> If הַ֠יּוֹם <WH3117> this day תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> will be a עֶ֜בֶד <WH5650> If thou wilt be a servant לָעָ֤ם <WH5971> unto this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> to this וַֽעֲבַדְתָּ֔ם <WH5647> and wilt serve וַעֲנִיתָ֕ם <WH6030> them and answer וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <WH1696> And they spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about דְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> words טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> good וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become לְךָ֛ עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> to them then they will be thy servants כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever

וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <WH5800> But he forsook אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> of the old men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְעָצֻ֑הוּ <WH3289> which they had given וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <WH3289> him and consulted אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> with the young men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> that were grown up אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> with him [and] which stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to מָ֚ה <WH4100> What אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <WH3289> unto them What counsel give וְנָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> ye that we may דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> answer אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who דִּבְּר֤וּ <WH1696> who have spoken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> to me saying הָקֵל֙ <WH7043> upon us lighter מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעֹ֔ל <WH5923> the yoke אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> did put אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> which thy father עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> him

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> with him spake אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> And the young men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> that were grown up אִתּוֹ֮ <WH854> to him לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> unto him saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus shalt thou speak לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto this people הַזֶּ֡ה <WH2088> to this אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who דִּבְּר֨וּ <WH1696> that spake אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto thee saying אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> Thy father הִכְבִּ֣יד <WH3513> heavy אֶת־ <WH853> עֻלֵּ֔נוּ <WH5923> our yoke וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> now you הָקֵ֣ל <WH7043> but make thou [it] lighter מֵעָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> unto us thus shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to קָֽטָנִּ֥י <WH6995> unto them My little עָבָ֖ה <WH5666> [finger] shall be thicker מִמָּתְנֵ֥י <WH4975> loins אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> than my father's

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Whereas אָבִי֙ <WH1> And now whereas my father הֶעְמִ֤יס <WH6006> did lade עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and עֹ֣ל <WH5923> yoke כָּבֵ֔ד <WH3515> you with a heavy וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> I will add עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <WH5923> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father יִסַּ֤ר <WH3256> hath chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <WH7752> you with whips וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I אֲיַסֵּ֥ר <WH3256> but I will chastise אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בָּעַקְרַבִּֽים׃ <WH6137> you with scorpions

[וַיָּבֹו כ] (וַיָּבֹ֨וא <WH935> abide ק) יָרָבְעָ֧ם <WH3379> So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <WH7346> to Rehoboam בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> the third כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> had appointed הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> as the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> Come to me again אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> the third

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people קָשָׁ֑ה <WH7186> roughly וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <WH5800> and forsook אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> the old men's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְעָצֻֽהוּ׃ <WH3289> that they gave

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And spake אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כַּעֲצַ֤ת <WH6098> to them after the counsel הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> of the young men לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אָבִי֙ <WH1> My father הִכְבִּ֣יד <WH3513> heavy אֶֽת־ <WH853> עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <WH5923> your yoke וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> and I will add עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <WH5923> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father יִסַּ֤ר <WH3256> [also] chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <WH7752> you with whips וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I אֲיַסֵּ֥ר <WH3256> but I will chastise אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בָּעַקְרַבִּֽים׃ <WH6137> you with scorpions

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Wherefore the king אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> not unto the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> it was סִבָּה֙ <WH5438> for the cause מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> was from the LORD לְמַ֜עַן <WH4616> might הָקִ֣ים <WH6965> that he might perform אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֗וֹ <WH1697> his saying אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by אֲחִיָּ֣ה <WH281> Ahijah הַשִּׁילֹנִ֔י <WH7888> the Shilonite אֶל־ <WH413> to יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> unto Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָֽט׃ <WH5028> of Nebat

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> when all Israel כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hearkened הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> that the king אֲלֵיהֶם֒ <WH413> about וַיָּשִׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> So הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> not unto them the people אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּבָ֣ר ׀ <WH1697> answered לֵאמֹ֡ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּנוּ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> What portion בְּדָוִ֜ד <WH1732> David וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נַחֲלָ֣ה <WH5159> inheritance בְּבֶן־ <WH1121> in the son יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> of Jesse לְאֹהָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH168> to your tents יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel עַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now רְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> now see בֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> to thine own house דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> departed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> So Israel לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> unto their tents

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> But [as for] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over רְחַבְעָֽם׃ <WH7346> Rehoboam פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹרָם֙ <WH151> Adoram אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַמַּ֔ס <WH4522> who [was] over the tribute וַיִּרְגְּמ֨וּ <WH7275> stoned כָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and all Israel בּ֛וֹ אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> him with stones וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> that he died וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Therefore king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> Rehoboam הִתְאַמֵּץ֙ <WH553> made speed לַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to get him up בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֔ה <WH4818> to his chariot לָנ֖וּס <WH5127> to flee יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיִּפְשְׁע֤וּ <WH6586> rebelled יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> So Israel בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> against the house דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this ס

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came כִּשְׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> heard כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And it came to pass when all Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> was come again יָרָבְעָ֔ם <WH3379> that Jeroboam וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֗וּ <WH7971> that they sent וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <WH7121> and called אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> him unto the congregation וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <WH4427> and made him king אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over all Israel לֹ֤א <WH3808> None הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> there was none that followed בֵית־ <WH1004> the house דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David זוּלָתִ֥י <WH2108> but שֵֽׁבֶט־ <WH7626> the tribe יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone
